gurmukhi: ਜਾਤ ਹੈ ਜਗਤ੍ਰ ਜੈਸੇ ਤੀਰਥ ਜਾਤ੍ਰਾ ਨਮਿਤ ਮਾਝ ਹੀ ਬਸਤ ਬਗ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਨ ਜਾਨੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaat Hai Jagatr Jaisay Teerad Jaatraa Namita , Maajh Hee Basat Bag Mahimaa N Jaanee Hai ?
translation: Just as the whole world go to places of pilgrimage, but the egret living there has not appreciated the greatness of these places,

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਪ੍ਰਗਾਸ ਭਾਸਕਰਿ ਜਗਮਗ ਜੋਤ ੳੁਲੂ ਅੰਧ ਕੰਧ ਬੁਰੀ ਕਰਨੀ ਕਮਾਨੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Pooran Pragaas Bhaasakari Jagamag Jota , Uloo Andh Kandh Buree Karanee Kamaanee Hai ?
translation: Just as bright light spreads all around when the Sun rises, but an owl has committed so many ill deeds that he remains hidden in dark caves and burrows,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੳੁ ਬਸੰਤ ਸਮੈ ਸਫਲ ਬਨਾਸਪਤੀ ਨਿਹਫਲ ਸੈਂਬਲ ਬਡਾੲੀ ੳੁਰ ਅਾਨੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Basant Samai Sadhal Banaasapatee , Nihadhal Sainbal Badaaee Ur Aanee Hai ?
translation: Just as all vegetation bears flowers and fruits during spring season but a cotton silk tree who has brought in him the praise of being big and mighty, remains bereft of flowers and fruits.

gurmukhi: ਮੋਹ ਗੁਰ ਸਾਗਰ ਮੈ ਚਾਖਿਓ ਨਹੀ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸੁ ਤ੍ਰਿਖਾਵੰਤ ਚਾਤ੍ਰਿਕ ਜੁਗਤ ਬਕਬਾਨੀ ਹੈ ||੫੨੫||
transliteration: Moh Gur Saagar Mai Chaakhiao Nahee Praym Rasu , Trikhaavant Chaatrik Jougat Bakabaanee Hai ?525?
translation: Despite living near the vast ocean like True Guru, I, the unfortunate one, had not tasted the divine elixir obtained by His loving worship. I have only been making noise of my thirst like a rain-bird. I have only indulged in empty arguments and contemplat
